name: Event type
description: HL7-defined table containing trigger event codes that identify specific events within healthcare workflow

values.definition: Notifies systems when a patient is admitted to a facility or begins a visit
Patient is transferred from one location to another within the facility
Patient is discharged from the facility or visit has ended
Patient registration information is created or updated
Patient is pre-admitted for future admission

values.description: Change an outpatient to an inpatient
values.definition: Patient status changed from outpatient to inpatient

values.description: Change an inpatient to an outpatient
values.definition: Patient status changed from inpatient to outpatient
Patient demographic or administrative information is updated
Patient is departing from a location (tracking purposes)
Patient has arrived at a location (tracking purposes)
Previously sent admit or visit notification is cancelled
Previously sent transfer notification is cancelled
Previously sent discharge notification is cancelled
Patient information from multiple records is merged
